title: Subpart 79-10 - Marriage And Family Therapy
content:

State Regulations
§ 79-10.1 - Professional study of marriage and family therapy
§ 79-10.2 - Professional licensing examinations
§ 79-10.3 - Experience requirement
§ 79-10.4 - Limited permits for licensure and limited diagnostic permits
§ 79-10.5 - Classifications systems
§ 79-10.6 - Diagnostic privilege
§ 79-10.7 - Licensure by endorsement of certain licensed marriage and family therapists
§ 79-10.8 - Continuing education for licensed marriage and family therapists

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
